String.string: All Shariar carry a badge. You should, too.
Now you look like a proper member of the Shariar.
Kill {@LinkCreature:48#7#zariik dazzlers} around {@Rgn:48006$$Carnage Vale} and collect their mana crystals.
Deliver the mana crystals to {@LinkCreature:248#3001#Naveld} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel}.
Kill {@LinkCreature:48#5#hulrap bashers} around {@Rgn:48006$$Carnage Vale} and collect their cores.
Deliver the argon cores to {@LinkCreature:248#3001#Naveld} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel}.
Kill {@LinkCreature:48#13#syndrene dragoons} around {@Rgn:48006$$Carnage Vale} and collect their cyasma.
Deliver the cyasma to {@LinkCreature:248#3001#Naveld} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel}.
